message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business.  I'm confident it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you. To make this a truly attractive deal, I'm willing to let it go for $1,400,000. This is a significant opportunity to acquire a game-changing asset at a price that's well below its true worth. Let's discuss further.
